name: Youtube [Material Theme/Material Design 2.0]
description:
Modifies Youtube to fit Google's rework of Material Design.

Features:
- Rounded video thumbnails
- Material Theme navigation bar
- Dark theme search suggestions (for dark themed Youtube)
additional_info:
Version 2.0.1 (8 July 2020) Updated navigation bar to have rounded selection targets; selected item changed to red highlight Version 2.0.0 Update for new Youtube Layout Version 1.1.1 Fixed clipping issue with gradient background of thumbnail Version 1.1.0 Fixed subscribe button colours (made button more obvious when unsubscribed) Now rounds corners around playlist card, badges and main video (when in default view) Also rounds settings in youtube player Font of youtube series' titles changed back to default font Replaces video duration in thumbnail to have a gradient background Version 1.0.1 Added option to toggle hiding of "report search predictions" and choose orientation of overflow menu (3 dots icon). Version 1.0.0 First version of this stylesheet; Provides:
  • Rounded buttons
  • Google Sans font
  • Outlined icons
  • Dark mode search results
  • Minor changes to buttons

style_setting_options.label: Yes
Vertical
